Monday, July 30, 2012

Re: Piranha 3DD (Movie)


To Whom It May Concern:

My name is Stephen Scibelli and I am Associate General Counsel for The Weinstein Company and am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the copyrighted works currently posted on the website. 
 
Pursuant to the provisions of the DMCA and applicable international copyright treaties, I am writing to you to request you immediately disable access to the following which includes links to download Piranha 3DD (Movie)
 which have not been authorized by us for download at this time:

I hereby confirm that I have a good faith belief that use of these materials is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agents, or the law.  The information in this notice is accurate and, under penalty of perjury, that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

I trust that this matter will be addressed promptly and with the utmost care.  Would you please let me know when this has been removed from your site?  My contact information is as follows:

Stephen Scibelli
The Weinstein Company
99 Hudson Street
New York, NY 10013
(212) 845-8657
Steve.scibelli@weinsteinco.com

This letter is sent without prejudice to The Weinstein Company's rights or remedies in connection with this matter, all of which are expressly reserved.

/s/

Stephen Scibelli
Associate General Counsel


List of Infringing Item or Material        
Name of Intellectual Property Owner: The Weinstein Company
Item/Material:    Piranha 3DD (Movie)
    
Infringing Webpage:    ------------------------------

INFRINGEMENT DETAIL
--------------------

Infringing Title: Piranha 3DD (Movie)
Date Found: 30 Jul 2012 03:00:00 EST (GMT -0500)
URL: http://loudplay.net/showthread.php?1200399-Piranha-3DD-(2012)-DVDrip-XViD
